page.title: 16LIFE ON A DEVON FARM 2
page.content: Life at Oak Gates Farm in 1985 is sometimes very hectic especially in the summer when the sun shines and there are so many jobs to do on the farm and young people need driving to work and social occasions. There is not a lot of social life in this area especially for young people and children unless you are prepared to travel to nearby towns, which means owning a car is almost a necessity. The children have to travel to school by coach, most of them being picked up at their homes, which in many cases means that children from towns have further to walk to school. The school bus also acts as a service bus which is new to this area. We also have a bus to Okehampton twice a week and to Exeter and Holsworthy once a month for shopping trips. It is interesting meeting tourists in the summer.
